It was a bright summer's morning, and Yoshi looked about the local land. Eventually, he got frustrated. "Man... I'm so friggin' short... I've been drawn up as 3 feet tall, and I'm not even THAT. Man... I wanna be so much taller."
Suddenly, a voice causes him to turn. "Lament not, little one. I can grant your wish," it said.
"You can?"
"Yes, I can, and quite easily. Allow me to answer your desires."
The Yoshi, a sparkle in his eye, requested, "Alright. Can you make me grow past all reality? I wanna be huge...

info.description:
Yoshi's are a dinosaur species in the super Mario universe ranging from 3 foot to 8 feet tall. Yoshi's have huge appetites, A long frog like tongue they use to gobble anything with, bottomless stomachs and, Come in just about any color.

(if you don't know what a Yoshi is then why are you here?)

This Interactive Story is for any Yoshi fan that likes Yoshi and want him bigger. macro,inflation,weight gain, Belly expansion. What ever it is he must grow in some way. I like Yoshi's bellies a lot a, Bigger better fatter.

The Yoshi in this story can be but doesn't have to be the hero from the games can be a different one and doesn't have to be green can be any color

1. NO sex No dick expansion.
2. Popping is aloud but he has to be really big before he pops (like bigger then new york)
3. Only Yoshi can expand
4. Yoshi can't die if he pops he reforms
5. Weight gain and inflation are good to. Try to go overbore on the expansion make him huge (like bigger then the planet est) other then that just have fun
